sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO JNITCMSMBR ( MBR_ID , ORG_ID , POS_ID , SITE_ID , MBR_LOGIN , MBR_NM , MBR_PHOTO , PASSWD , TYPE_ID , TEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , CREATED , MODIFIED , SN , DP , ISDEL , HOMEPAGE , POSTCODE , ADDRESS , EMAIL_RECV , SMS_RECV , ESTABLISHMENT , CORPORATION , PRIMARY_KEY , MUTUAL , CORPORATE_NAME , GROUP_NAME , BUSINESS_PLACE , BUSINESS_ADDR , GROUP_KIND , GROUP_TEL , GROUP_PAX , GROUP_TYPE , GRP_CONFIRM , RANK_ID , WORK_CONTENTS , GRADE_NM , ODR , CONNECT_TYPE , GROUP_TITLE , PW_MISCNT , ADDRESS_NEW , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW , EX01 , EX02 , EX03 ) VALUES ( #mbrId# , #orgId# , #posId# , #siteId# , #mbrLogin# , #mbrNm# , #mbrPhoto# , #passwd# , #typeId# , #tel# , #mobile# , #email# , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #sn# , #dp# , #isdel# , #homepage# , #postcode# , #address# , #emailRecv# , #smsRecv# , #establishment# , #corporation# , #primaryKey# , #mutual# , #corporateName# , #groupName# , #businessPlace# , #businessAddr# , #groupKind# , #groupTel# , #groupPax# , #groupType# , #grpConfirm# , #rankId# , #workContents# , #gradeNm# , #odr# , #connectType# , #groupTitle# , 1 , #addressNew# , #businessAddrNew# , #ex01# , #ex02# , #ex03# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE JNITCMSMBR
SET ORG_ID=#orgId# , POS_ID=#posId# , MBR_NM=#mbrNm# , MBR_PHOTO=#mbrPhoto#
, PASSWD=#passwd#
, TYPE_ID=#typeId# , TEL=#tel# , MOBILE=#mobile# , EMAIL=#email# , MODIFIED=SYSDATE , HOMEPAGE=#homepage# , POSTCODE=#postcode# , ADDRESS=#address# , EMAIL_RECV=#emailRecv# , SMS_RECV=#smsRecv# , ESTABLISHMENT=#establishment# , CORPORATION=#corporation# , PRIMARY_KEY=#primaryKey# , MUTUAL=#mutual# , CORPORATE_NAME=#corporateName# , GROUP_NAME=#groupName# , BUSINESS_PLACE=#businessPlace# , BUSINESS_ADDR=#businessAddr# , GROUP_KIND=#groupKind# , GROUP_TEL=#groupTel# , GROUP_PAX=#groupPax# , GROUP_TYPE=#groupType# , GRP_CONFIRM=#grpConfirm# , RANK_ID=#rankId# , WORK_CONTENTS=#workContents# , GRADE_NM=#gradeNm# , ODR=#odr# , GROUP_TITLE=#groupTitle# , PW_MISCNT=#pwMiscnt# , ADDRESS_NEW=#addressNew# , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW=#businessAddrNew# , EX01=#ex01# , EX02=#ex02# , EX03=#ex03#
WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#
SET PW_MISCNT=#pwMiscnt#
WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#
SET TYPE_ID=#typeId# , MODIFIED=SYSDATE , ISDEL=1
WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#
SET DP=#dp#
WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#
SET PASSWD=#passwd# WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin#
SET GRP_CONFIRM=#grpConfirm# WHERE 1=1 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#

UPDATE JNITCMSMBR SET ORG_ID=#orgId# , POS_ID=#posId# , MBR_NM=#mbrNm# , MBR_PHOTO=#mbrPhoto#
, PASSWD=#passwd#
, TYPE_ID=#typeId# , TEL=#tel# , MOBILE=#mobile# , EMAIL=#email# , MODIFIED=SYSDATE , HOMEPAGE=#homepage# , POSTCODE=#postcode# , ADDRESS=#address# , EMAIL_RECV=#emailRecv# , SMS_RECV=#smsRecv# , ESTABLISHMENT=#establishment# , CORPORATION=#corporation# , PRIMARY_KEY=#primaryKey# , MUTUAL=#mutual# , CORPORATE_NAME=#corporateName# , GROUP_NAME=#groupName# , BUSINESS_PLACE=#businessPlace# , BUSINESS_ADDR=#businessAddr# , GROUP_KIND=#groupKind# , GROUP_TEL=#groupTel# , GROUP_PAX=#groupPax# , GROUP_TYPE=#groupType# , GRP_CONFIRM=#grpConfirm# , RANK_ID=#rankId# , WORK_CONTENTS=#workContents# , GRADE_NM=#gradeNm# , ODR=#odr# , GROUP_TITLE=#groupTitle# , PW_MISCNT=#pwMiscnt# , ADDRESS_NEW=#addressNew# , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW=#businessAddrNew# , EX01=#ex01# , EX02=#ex02# , EX03=#ex03# WHERE ISDEL=0 AND MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin#
UPDATE JNITCMSMBR SET ISDEL=1 , MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin# WHERE ISDEL=0 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#

UPDATE JNITCMSMBR SET MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin# , ORG_ID=#orgId# , POS_ID=#posId# , MBR_NM=#mbrNm# , MBR_PHOTO=#mbrPhoto#
, PASSWD=#passwd#
, TYPE_ID=#typeId# , TEL=#tel# , MOBILE=#mobile# , EMAIL=#email# , MODIFIED=SYSDATE , HOMEPAGE=#homepage# , POSTCODE=#postcode# , ADDRESS=#address# , EMAIL_RECV=#emailRecv# , SMS_RECV=#smsRecv# , ESTABLISHMENT=#establishment# , CORPORATION=#corporation# , PRIMARY_KEY=#primaryKey# , MUTUAL=#mutual# , CORPORATE_NAME=#corporateName# , GROUP_NAME=#groupName# , BUSINESS_PLACE=#businessPlace# , BUSINESS_ADDR=#businessAddr# , GROUP_KIND=#groupKind# , GROUP_TEL=#groupTel# , GROUP_PAX=#groupPax# , GROUP_TYPE=#groupType# , GRP_CONFIRM=#grpConfirm# , RANK_ID=#rankId# , WORK_CONTENTS=#workContents# , ODR=#odr# , GROUP_TITLE=#groupTitle# , PW_MISCNT=#pwMiscnt# , ADDRESS_NEW=#addressNew# , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW=#businessAddrNew# , EX01=#ex01# , EX02=#ex02# , EX03=#ex03# WHERE ISDEL=0 AND MBR_ID=#mbrId#

update.isEqual: UPDATE JNITCMSMBR SET ISDEL=1 , MODIFIED=SYSDATE WHERE MBR_ID=#mbrId#

sqlMap.delete: UPDATE JNITCMSMBR SET ISDEL=1 , MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin# , ORG_ID=#orgId# , POS_ID=#posId# , MBR_NM=#mbrNm# , MBR_PHOTO='' , PASSWD=#passwd# , TYPE_ID=#typeId# , TEL='' , MOBILE='' , EMAIL='' , HOMEPAGE='' , POSTCODE='' , ADDRESS='' , EMAIL_RECV=0 , SMS_RECV=0 , SN='' , DP='' , MODIFIED=sysdate , ESTABLISHMENT='' , CORPORATION='' , PRIMARY_KEY='' , MUTUAL='' , CORPORATE_NAME='' , GROUP_NAME='' , BUSINESS_PLACE='' , BUSINESS_ADDR='' , GROUP_KIND='' , GROUP_TEL='' , GROUP_PAX='' , GROUP_TYPE='' , GRP_CONFIRM='N' , RANK_ID='' , WORK_CONTENTS='' , GROUP_TITLE='' , PW_MISCNT=0 , ADDRESS_NEW='' , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW='' , EX01='' , EX02='' , EX03='' WHERE MBR_ID=#mbrId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT MBR_ID , ORG_ID , POS_ID , SITE_ID , MBR_LOGIN , MBR_NM , MBR_PHOTO , PASSWD , TYPE_ID , TEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , CREATED , MODIFIED , SN , DP , ISDEL , HOMEPAGE , POSTCODE , ADDRESS , EMAIL_RECV , SMS_RECV , ESTABLISHMENT , CORPORATION , PRIMARY_KEY , MUTUAL , CORPORATE_NAME , GROUP_NAME , BUSINESS_PLACE , BUSINESS_ADDR , GROUP_KIND , GROUP_TEL , GROUP_PAX , GROUP_TYPE , GRP_CONFIRM , RANK_ID , WORK_CONTENTS , GRADE_NM , ODR , CONNECT_TYPE , GROUP_TITLE , PW_MISCNT , ADDRESS_NEW , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW , EX01 , EX02 , EX03 FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE 1=1
ISDEL=0
SITE_ID=#siteId#
MBR_ID=#mbrId#
MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin#
MBR_NM=#mbrNm# AND EMAIL=#email# AND MOBILE=#mobile#
MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin# AND MBR_NM=#mbrNm# AND EMAIL=#email# AND MOBILE=#mobile#
MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin# AND MBR_NM=#mbrNm#
SELECT * FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE ISDEL=0 AND MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin#

SELECT MBR_ID , ORG_ID , POS_ID , SITE_ID , MBR_LOGIN , MBR_NM , MBR_PHOTO , PASSWD , TYPE_ID , TEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , CREATED , MODIFIED , SN , DP , ISDEL , HOMEPAGE , POSTCODE , ADDRESS , EMAIL_RECV , SMS_RECV , ESTABLISHMENT , CORPORATION , PRIMARY_KEY , MUTUAL , CORPORATE_NAME , GROUP_NAME , BUSINESS_PLACE , BUSINESS_ADDR , GROUP_KIND , GROUP_TEL , GROUP_PAX , GROUP_TYPE , GRP_CONFIRM , RANK_ID , WORK_CONTENTS , GRADE_NM , ODR , CONNECT_TYPE , GROUP_TITLE , PW_MISCNT , ADDRESS_NEW , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW , EX01 , EX02 , EX03 FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE ISDEL=0
DP=#dp#
ESTABLISHMENT = #establishment#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MBR_ID , ORG_ID , POS_ID , SITE_ID , MBR_LOGIN , MBR_NM , MBR_PHOTO , PASSWD , TYPE_ID , TEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , SN , DP , ISDEL , HOMEPAGE , POSTCODE , ADDRESS , EMAIL_RECV , SMS_RECV , ESTABLISHMENT , CORPORATION , PRIMARY_KEY , MUTUAL , CORPORATE_NAME , GROUP_NAME , BUSINESS_PLACE , BUSINESS_ADDR , GROUP_KIND , GROUP_TEL , GROUP_PAX , GROUP_TYPE , GRP_CONFIRM , RANK_ID , WORK_CONTENTS , GRADE_NM , ODR , CONNECT_TYPE , GROUP_TITLE , PW_MISCNT , ADDRESS_NEW , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW , EX01 , EX02 , EX03 FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE ISDEL=0
TYPE_ID = #schTypeId#
MBR_ID = #searchKeyword#
ORG_ID = #searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
TEL LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
MBR_NM=#schMbrNm# AND EMAIL=#schEmail#
DP = #searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND PASSWD='1'
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND PASSWD='2'
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND PASSWD='3'
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND MBR_NM=#schMbrNm#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND DP=#schMbrNm#
ESTABLISHMENT=#searchKeyword#
ESTABLISHMENT=#searchKeyword# AND CORPORATION=#searchKeyword1#
ESTABLISHMENT=#searchKeyword# AND CORPORATION=#searchKeyword1# AND PRIMARY_KEY=#searchKeyword2#
PRIMARY_KEY=#searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND EMAIL=#searchKeyword1# AND MOBILE=#searchKeyword2#
ORDER BY MBR_ID DESC ) A WHERE 1=1
ROWNUM <= #lastIndex#
)WHERE 1=1
RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE ISDEL=0
TYPE_ID = #schTypeId#
MBR_ID = #searchKeyword#
ORG_ID = #searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
TEL LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
MBR_NM=#schMbrNm# AND EMAIL=#schEmail#
DP = #searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND PASSWD='1'
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND PASSWD='2'
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND PASSWD='3'
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND MBR_NM=#schMbrNm#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND DP=#schMbrNm#
ESTABLISHMENT=#searchKeyword#
ESTABLISHMENT=#searchKeyword# AND CORPORATION=#searchKeyword1#
ESTABLISHMENT=#searchKeyword# AND CORPORATION=#searchKeyword1# AND PRIMARY_KEY=#searchKeyword2#
PRIMARY_KEY=#searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword#
MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND EMAIL=#searchKeyword1# AND MOBILE=#searchKeyword2#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.MBR_ID , a.ORG_ID , a.POS_ID , a.SITE_ID , a.MBR_LOGIN , a.MBR_NM , a.MBR_PHOTO , a.PASSWD , a.TYPE_ID , a.TEL , a.MOBILE , a.EMAIL , a.CREATED , a.MODIFIED , a.SN , a.DP , a.ISDEL , a.HOMEPAGE , a.POSTCODE , a.ADDRESS , a.EMAIL_RECV , a.SMS_RECV , a.ESTABLISHMENT , a.CORPORATION , a.PRIMARY_KEY , a.MUTUAL , a.CORPORATE_NAME , a.GROUP_NAME , a.BUSINESS_PLACE , a.BUSINESS_ADDR , a.GROUP_KIND , a.GROUP_TEL , a.GROUP_PAX , a.GROUP_TYPE , a.GRP_CONFIRM , a.RANK_ID , a.WORK_CONTENTS , a.GRADE_NM , a.ODR , a.CONNECT_TYPE , a.GROUP_TITLE , a.PW_MISCNT , a.ADDRESS_NEW , a.BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW , a.EX01 , a.EX02 , a.EX03 , b.ORG_ID AS BORG_ID , b.ORG_NM , b.ORG_DETH , b.ORG_RANK , c.RANK_NAME , d.POS_NM , d.POS_LV , e.TYPE_LV , e.TYPE_NM , ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM JNITCMSMBR a
LEFT JOIN JNITCMSORG b ON b.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSRANK c ON c.RANK_ID = a.RANK_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSPOS d ON d.POS_ID =a.POS_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSMBRTYPE e ON e.TYPE_ID = a.TYPE_ID
ORDER BY a.MBR_ID DESC
ORDER BY a.RANK_ID ASC
ORDER BY b.ORG_RANK_ODR ASC, a.ODR ASC, d.POS_LV ASC
ORDER BY a.MBR_ID ASC
) a
LEFT JOIN JNITCMSORG b ON b.ORG_ID = a.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSRANK c ON c.RANK_ID = a.RANK_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSPOS d ON d.POS_ID =a.POS_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSMBRTYPE e ON e.TYPE_ID = a.TYPE_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND a.ISDEL=0
a.ORG_ID = #orgId#
a.CONNECT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchConnectKeyword#,'%')
( e.TYPE_LV = 'A' OR e.TYPE_LV = 'B' OR e.TYPE_LV = 'C' OR e.TYPE_LV = 'D' )
(e.TYPE_ID = #typeIdKeyword# OR e.TYPE_ID = #typeIdKeyword2# OR e.TYPE_ID = #typeIdKeyword3#)
a.PW_MISCNT > 5
e.TYPE_ID = #searchKeyword2#
a.TYPE_ID = #schTypeId#
(a.ODR != 0 AND a.ODR IS NOT NULL )
(a.ODR != 0 AND a.ODR IS NOT NULL ) AND e.TYPE_NM LIKE '%공사직원%'
$Query$
a.GRP_CONFIRM = #grpConfirm#
a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword#
a.ORG_ID = #searchKeyword#
a.POS_ID = #searchKeyword#
a.MBR_ID != #searchKeyword# AND a.MBR_ID != #searchKeyword2#
(c.RANK_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.WORK_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.TEL LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
(c.RANK_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR d.POS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.WORK_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.TEL LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
a.MBR_LOGIN LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
d.POS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
c.RANK_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
d.POS_NM IS NULL
e.TYPE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
(a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword# OR a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword2#)
e.TYPE_LV = #searchKeyword#
a.TYPE_ID = #searchKeyword#
( a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword# OR a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
( a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword# OR a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.TYPE_ID = #searchKeyword# OR e.TYPE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR e.TYPE_LV = #searchKeyword# )
ROWNUM <= #lastIndex#
)WHERE 1=1
RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM JNITCMSMBR a LEFT JOIN JNITCMSORG b ON a.ORG_ID = b.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSRANK c ON a.RANK_ID = c.RANK_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSPOS d ON a.POS_ID = d.POS_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSMBRTYPE e ON e.TYPE_ID = a.TYPE_ID
WHERE 1=1 AND a.ISDEL=0
a.ORG_ID = #orgId#
a.CONNECT_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchConnectKeyword#,'%')
( e.TYPE_LV = 'A' OR e.TYPE_LV = 'B' OR e.TYPE_LV = 'C' OR e.TYPE_LV = 'D' )
(e.TYPE_ID = #typeIdKeyword# OR e.TYPE_ID = #typeIdKeyword2# OR e.TYPE_ID = #typeIdKeyword3#)
a.PW_MISCNT > 5
e.TYPE_ID = #searchKeyword2#
a.TYPE_ID = #schTypeId#
(a.ODR != 0 AND a.ODR IS NOT NULL )
$Query$
a.GRP_CONFIRM = #grpConfirm#
a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword#
a.ORG_ID = #searchKeyword#
a.POS_ID = #searchKeyword#
a.MBR_ID != #searchKeyword# AND a.MBR_ID != #searchKeyword2#
(c.RANK_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.WORK_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.TEL LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
(c.RANK_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR d.POS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.WORK_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.TEL LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
a.MBR_LOGIN LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
d.POS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
c.RANK_NAME LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
d.POS_NM IS NULL
e.TYPE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
(a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword# OR a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword2#)
e.TYPE_LV = #searchKeyword#
a.TYPE_ID = #searchKeyword#
( a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword# OR a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%')
( a.MBR_ID = #searchKeyword# OR a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR a.TYPE_ID = #searchKeyword# OR e.TYPE_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%' OR e.TYPE_LV = #searchKeyword# )

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE ISDEL=0
ESTABLISHMENT=#establishment#
CORPORATION=#corporation#
PRIMARY_KEY=#primaryKey#
SELECT NEXT_ID FROM JNITSEQ WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'JNITCMSMBR_ID'

SELECT MBR_ID , ORG_ID , POS_ID , SITE_ID , MBR_LOGIN , MBR_NM , MBR_PHOTO , PASSWD , TYPE_ID , TEL , MOBILE , EMAIL , CREATED , MODIFIED , SN , DP , ISDEL , HOMEPAGE , POSTCODE , ADDRESS , EMAIL_RECV , SMS_RECV , ESTABLISHMENT , CORPORATION , PRIMARY_KEY , MUTUAL , CORPORATE_NAME , GROUP_NAME , BUSINESS_PLACE , BUSINESS_ADDR , GROUP_KIND , GROUP_TEL , GROUP_PAX , GROUP_TYPE , GRP_CONFIRM , RANK_ID , WORK_CONTENTS , GRADE_NM , ODR , CONNECT_TYPE , GROUP_TITLE , PW_MISCNT , ADDRESS_NEW , BUSINESS_ADDR_NEW , EX01 , EX02 , EX03 FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE 1=1
SITE_ID = #siteId#
MBR_LOGIN = #mbrLogin#
ISDEL=0 AND MBR_LOGIN=#searchKeyword# AND MBR_NM=#schMbrNm#
ISDEL=0 AND MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin# AND PASSWD=#passwd#

SELECT a.* , b.org_id AS ORGSUBID , b.org_nm AS ORGSUBNM , b.isdel AS ORGSUBISDEL , c.pos_id AS POSSUBID , c.pos_nm AS POSSUBNM , c.isdel AS POSSUBISDEL FROM JNITCMSMBR a LEFT JOIN JNITCMSORG b ON a.ORG_ID = b.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN JNITCMSPOS c ON a.POS_ID = c.POS_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.isdel = 0 AND b.isdel = 0 AND c.isdel = 0
a.MBR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
b.ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
a.MOBILE LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
c.POS_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 10
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM JNITCMSMBR WHERE MBR_LOGIN=#mbrLogin#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE JNITCMSMBR SET PW_MISCNT = 1 , LOCK_DATE = NULL WHERE 1 = 1 AND PW_MISCNT > 5 AND TRUNC(MOD((SYSDATE - LOCK_DATE)*24,1)*60) >= #unlockTime#
